meanings.sent1: Her impeccable performance in the play impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The tailor's impeccable stitching made the dress look perfect.
meanings.sent3: Even the mischievous puppy couldn't find a flaw in her impeccable plan.
meanings.sent4: His impeccable timing on the basketball court was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The chef's impeccable attention to detail elevated the dish to a work of art.

meanings.definition: In accordance with the highest standards; perfect.
meanings.sent1: The hotel's impeccable service left a lasting impression on the guests.
meanings.sent2: She had an impeccable sense of style that always turned heads.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's impeccable timing had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The orchestra's impeccable harmony filled the concert hall with magic.
meanings.sent5: His impeccable manners made him a favorite among his peers.
